DocAttribute.Name: RasterFormat
DocAttribute.Documentation: The format of the _RasterCode_ often using a compression.

DocAttribute.Name: RasterCode
DocAttribute.Documentation: Blob, given as a single binary, to capture the texture within one popular file (compression) format.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Currently the formats of bmp, jpg, gif and pgn, shall be supported.
